Description:
A Bright Family Future!
Situated in a sought-after location only minutes from local schooling, Corio Central Shopping Plaza, public transport & within easy reach of The Ring Road for Geelong CBD, Melbourne CBD & Surf Coast access is this neatly presented property which offers more than meets the eye and is ideal for the first home buyer or investor. There are three well - proportioned bedrooms on offer with BIRs an ensuite to the master and a good - sized family bathroom with a bath and shower, and a separate toilet which services the remaining two bedrooms. The large central living area with split system heating and cooling adjoins the dining area and functional kitchen.
Two large and separate undercover alfresco areas, one paved and one decked provide a multitude of opportunities for outdoor entertaining and sheltered play space for the kids along with a generous block for family pets, veggie gardens or the backyard cricket match! To round out this family friendly package is a spacious shed ideal for the tradie or home handyperson and is accessible by side driveway and secured behind double gates.
With an approx rent return of $330 per week for the investors amongst you.
View this one quick smart to avoid disappointment!
Insights: 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Updated home on a 697m2 parcel of land
You won't be disappointed with the stunning updates or proportions of this neat 3 bedroom home which is currently tenanted at $255 pw. Investors, developers and first home buyers will appreciate the location & size of this bright and appealing property representing outstanding value for any purchaser. Comprising of a generous lounge upon entry complete with gas heater and floorboards that continue through to the updated kitchen that provides gas cooking. The three bedrooms in total offer amble space and are located close to the central bathroom which has been re-vamped with grey tiles and new vanity. Situated on an extensive 697m2 approx. parcel of land the backyard provides an abundance of space, a blank canvas perfect for the new owner of this charming property to utilise as they see fit and potentially sub-divide (STCA). Ideal location just minutes to the Corio train station with public transport just down the road and Corio Shopping Centre not far away. Easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and Geelong's CBD just a 10 minute drive down Princes Highway the home is within easy reach to all major amenities. Invest with the best and enquire now to secure this outstanding home today.
Insights: 197 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid investment or first home
A perfect investment or starting point in the market, this classic brick home on 534 sqm is ideally positioned within walking distance of schools, shops, public transport and the Ring Road. Comprising 3 bedrooms; 2 with built-in-robes and a contemporary bathroom with separate shower and bath, the appeal of this property is enhanced by two climate-controlled living zones. The lounge room provides gas heating, while the dining room boasts reverse cycle air conditioning, while a generous-sized kitchen with breakfast bar, gas stove and wall oven that overlooks the backyard. Additional highlights include ducted air conditioning, security shutters, energy-efficient solar panels and a detached over-sized single lock-up garage. Get in quick and register your interest today!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Solid first home or astute investment.
This delightful brick veneer home offers purchasers a chance to secure an updated and well cared for 3 bedroom family home on a generous 659m2 approx. parcel of land in a quiet court location. With quick access to the Ring Road and Corio Shopping centre as well as only a 10 minute drive from Geelong CBD makes this location very appealing. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms in total all serviced by the central bathroom which provides 2-way access from the main bedroom and hall. The large family lounge opens to the stylishly updated and tiled kitchen & dining room which includes large bench, dishwasher and stainless steel oven. The back yard offers a great paved undercover alfresco area ideal for entertaining and is completed by an extended double garage with added workshop perfect for secure off street parking. Situated in an established neighbourhood with close proximity to local reserves, schools and sporting facilities don't miss your opportunity to inspect such a quality home, enquire today.

Description:
Charming Family Home In Cloverdale Estate
Comfort and space form a wonderful combination throughout this well presented home. Located in the ever-popular Cloverdale Estate, this is the perfect opportunity for a first home owner, property investor or a family looking to expand!
This family home boasts an ample sized lounge room with gas heating which flows through to the light filled, open plan dining/kitchen area, kitchen complete with gas appliances and breakfast bar. Those who love to entertain will be drawn to the spacious undercover carport area that has easy access from the dining area.
Outside features a generous, fully fenced grassed backyard with well-maintained and established low maintenance gardens, large powered double lock up garage and a 5000-litre water tank.
A stylish home in a great location with all the necessities and more at your fingertips, which include schools, public transport, shopping centres & easy access to the Ring Road. This very affordable home is one not to be missed!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Great Investment/ Great Return - 293sqm
Safe and secure, just 5 minutes walk to Corio Village Shopping Centre, bus stop right out front, so close to everything including ring road access. This well presented 2 bedroom unit is a great investment, more like a small house, with only 2 on the block. With rendered exterior, the unit is very spacious and bright. Both bedrooms have built in robes, and the lovely bay window in the dining area lets in so much natural light. The open plan kitchen/dining has gas cooking, walk in pantry and ceiling fan, with split system in the lounge. Bathroom has spa bath, shower and separate toilet. Enjoy the private outdoor pergola area accessed from the master bedroom, dining room and lounge. Plenty of space to park with single garage plus workshop area, plus off street parking for 2 more vehicles. Currently tenanted at $270 per week to long term tenant.

Description:
Investment Hotspot / Family Friendly Location
Phone Enquiry ID:34375
3 Bedroom brick veneer house on a large block. Close to the Melbourne/Geelong Ring Road, short walking distance to primary schools and kindergartens, public transport and the Corio Shopping Centre.
Built in the 70's this solid, lovingly kept, one owner family home is the perfect property for an investor or a growing or aging family. With lots of backyard space for a bungalow / granny flat or several caravans you could have the grandparents and teenage children all living on the one property.
Being the largest suburb in Geelong and proving to be the growth corridor of the region, why wouldn’t you?
Contact owner regarding inspections and pricing.
For sale by negotiation.

Make the time to inspect now.

Description:
Impressive Family Home Ticking All The Boxes
For someone who wants everything and more, this is the home for you! Ticking all the boxes, this property is one not to be missed and will be suited to an investor, first home buyer or large family looking for room to move!
The family friendly and well-zoned layout features three bedrooms, all with built-in robes and the additional comfort of ceiling fans, large living area with gas wall heater that leads through to the light filled, spacious rumpus room perfectly utilised as a home office or teenagers retreat.
Furthermore, you will love the open plan kitchen/dining area which features electrical wall oven, gas stove and well-positioned breakfast bar that overlooks the rumpus room; allowing you to keep an eye on the little ones while they play.
Additionally, the property is lavished with ducted heating, split system air conditioning, 4.5w solar panels, roller shutters to the front windows, an alarm system and a tandem garage, which allows rear access and is great for extra storage. Extending on from the enticing indoor living spaces is the outdoor entertaining zone; ready to host guests all year round!
In combination with the spacious yard and manicured gardens; the whole family will love the abundance of space to enjoy the great outdoor surrounds. A large single garage/workshop and attached garden shed complete this attractive outdoor area.
Perfectly located within easy reach to the Ring Road, Corio Central Shopping Centre, Bell Post Shopping Centre, and public transport - this ‘complete package’ is sure to impress!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
A Prime Opportunity!
Make your mark in Corio with this single-owner brick home! North facing and situated on 530 sqm, astute developers and first home buyers will recognise its potential. Comprising 3 carpeted bedrooms with built-in-robes and ceiling fans, this residence features L-shaped lounge and dining rooms, timber kitchen with ample bench space and upright gas stove with oven. Additional benefits include solar panels, alarm system and aluminium windows with security shutters. A secure backyard provides access to a single lock-up garage with workshop, while beautiful manicured front and rear gardens are enhanced by pergola. A pergola and garden shed complete this property. Representing an ideal investment or family home, you'll enjoy living in a quiet pocket within walking distance of Banksia Reserve and close to schools, shops, cafes, public transport and the Ring Road.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Plan For The Future!
Positioned on a well-established & maintained block in a highly sort after pocket of Corio, this modest & comfortable property offers 3 bedrooms serviced by an original central bathroom, large & spacious lounge room with gas heating & air conditioner.
The partially updated kitchen offers stone bench tops, freestanding oven with adjoining meals area.
Step outside to embrace the undercover entertaining area with adjoining 4.6m x 8.4m garage perfect for further entertaining or great car accommodation.
All comprised on a large sun soaked 537m2 (approx) allotment accompanied by low-maintenance gardens offering you heaps of privacy. Set in one of Corio's most established streets with a potential rental return of approximately $280 - $290 per week, this home boasts easy access to the primary & secondary schools, Corio Shopping Village, easy access to the surf coast and the Geelong Ring Road - Simply move in and enjoy!
Terms: Deposit 10%, Settlement 30/60 days.

Description:
4 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms & the perfect location.
This vibrantly renovated and well looked after home has been designed with maximum comfort in mind. The 4 bedroom property in a prime location will certainly appeal to first home buyers, families and investor alike. The quality residence comprises of a spacious lounge which provides an archway to the superbly renovated kitchen, offering a dishwasher, gas stove top, wall oven and a generous meals area. A second living area can be found at the second story boasting a bar area and access to the second bathroom and two of the bedrooms of which all have BIR's. The 2 remaining bedrooms are serviced by their own bathroom downstairs. Outside you're greeted by a large alfresco area with a spa, an extensive rear yard & single garage while out front lies a large double carport. On a generous 613sqm block, perfectly situated in a convenient location only minutes from Corio Shopping Centre, Princes Fwy, quality schools for all ages and much more, this home is sure to tick all your boxes. Inspections are a must!

Description:
Rare Opportunity For First Home Or Investor!
Whether you are a first home buyer or investor, this home is guaranteed to please. Set on a 689m2 (approx.) it's a stone's throw from Corio Village Shopping Centre, only minutes from Schools, Shops & Public Transport, an hour's drive from Melbourne CBD, and a 15 minute drive from Geelong City Centre.
Apon entry you will be greeted by the separate lounge room which leads through to the dining and kitchen area which includes freestanding 900mm oven/cooktop with rangehood. Featuring 3 good sized bedrooms serviced by the family bathroom which includes shower, vanity, toilet and spa-bath.
Other features of the home include; 2 car garage, floor boards, air-conditioner, gas wall heater, extensive storage options, quiet court location & kept in a well maintained condition.
With a possible rental return of $260 per week being conservative, this home would be a fantastic add to your investment portfolio.

Description:
Brand New Quality Living or Investment!
This sensational brand new townhouse contain stunning finishes throughout and is sure to tick all the boxes for astute investors and first home buyers alike. Low maintenance and newly completed this townhouse will suit buyers looking for comfort, ease and convenience.
Open plan living, kitchen overlooking the meals area, stainless steel appliances & gas cooking all situated upstairs with an extra shower & bonus balcony. The 2 comfortable bedrooms with BIRs, study and modern bathroom are located on the ground floor. Potential rental return of $280 per week.
Complete with a car space, courtyard, water tank and split system for heating & cooling. Just minutes from the Corio Shopping Centre,15 minute commute to Geelong's CBD and Melbourne under an hour away this stunning property has all you need.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
"Ticks All the Boxes"
Stop looking!! This well positioned family home has everything on your checklist. Surrounded by other quality homes in a quiet location this property is perfectly positioned in the Rose Park Estate located close to all the amenities. Features of this property are 3 great size bedrooms with the Master bedroom having a full ensuite as well as a walk in robe. Both remaining bedrooms have walk in robes. Boasting a large formal lounge, huge kitchen with gas cook top, under bench oven, range hood and pantry. Opening to dining/living room with sliding door to the large covered pergola, perfect for entertaining all year round. Ducted heating throughout the home for the cold winter days and year round comfort is taken care of via a split system air conditioner in the living area. With features including double garage and plenty of room to store the boat or caravan this very desirable home is ready for you to move straight in.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 59 Nigella Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality Investment Or Lifestyle Opportunity
If you are after the ideal investment currently receiving $295 per week, or lifestyle without the hefty price tag this neat 5 year old residence should be on your hit list!
Featuring a well appointed kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space complimented by quality stainless steel appliances.
Comprising 3 sizeable bedrooms with robes and an immaculate two way bathroom off the master with separate shower and bath. But it is the generous living and dining space that separates this from the rest, and perfect for all occasions low maintenance yard.
Off street parking will be made easy with a single car garage while heating and cooling is taken care of with ducted heating and split system A/C.
With Corio Shopping Centre and the Ring Road both only moments away, the convenience of this home to live in or rent out couldn't be any more obvious. With schools, parkland and public transport only a short stroll away, the absolute value on offer here is not to be missed.
